name: Drop The Pin
description:
Drop The Pin

It is a puzzle game where you must remove the pins that you find in the world in order to advance

4 different characters and 4 different worlds, use your companions to help you, defeat the different enemies that will not surrender until they destroy you , use the artifacts found in the world to help you advance, jetpacks, trampolines, rocks, mobile platforms, portals, water, lava and memorize the abilities of the enemies to not fail, enemies that run fast, that throw projectiles and totems waiting to be annihilated.

Controls

the character walks automatically, you just have to remove the pins and to advance, be careful because if you remove the wrong pin the consequences could be serious :)

Development

After 3 months of development, here I bring you my second game, I hope you enjoy it, at the moment it has 40 levels and I will add more in the future
